summary: THE LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS FAILED WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS WITHOUT WARNING. I WAS FORCED TO DRIVE WITH THE HIGH BEAMS ILLUMINATED. THIS HAPPENS VERY FREQUENTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. I CALLED THE DEALER. THEY SAID IT WAS NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY. HE SAID THE PART WOULD BE ABOUT $600, AND WITH LABOR ALL COST WOULD RUN ABOUT $800!THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 71,100. REMANUFACTURED LCM IS ABOUT $300 OR NEW ABOUT $500 FROM AN INDEPENDENT AUTO PARTS STORE.  *TR
